artist: George Cruikshank; Publisher: David Bogue, London
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Thirza J. Cleveland
portfolio: Plate VI from The Drunkard's Children (A Sequel to the Bottle), David Bogue, London
provenance: Thirza Cleveland, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1994.
title: The Drunkard's Son is Sentenced to Transportation for Life; the Daughter, Implicated in the Robbery, to Imprisonment -- The Brother and Sister Part for Ever in this World
